
```{r}
CHdatamap1 <- CHdatamap[-1, -2,]
CHdatamap1
```

```{r}
drop_na(CHdatamap1)
CHdatamap1
```

### Supprimer les lignes depuis Excel

```{r}
myCHmap <- st_read("~/L3pgeprojects/CountryReportCH/MapCH/CHE_adm/CHE_adm1.shp", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

datamap <- inner_join(myCHmap, CHdatamap1)

tm_shape(datamap) +
tm_polygons("Density", id = "NAME_1", palette = "Blues")+ 
#breaks = c(0, 5, 10, 100, 1000, 2000, 5000, 10000), labels = 1:7, right = F, ordered_result = T)

tmap_mode("view")
DensityMap <- tmap_last()


tmap_save(DensityMap, "DensityMap.html")
```
